SELECT D1.PD_CD AS ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , D1.SAP_MAT_CD AS SAP_CD /* SAP코드 */ , D1.PD_NM AS ITM_PD_NM /* 품목상품명 */ , D1.PD_ABBR_NM AS ITM_PD_NM1 /* 품목상품약어명 */ , D1.IMG_APN_FILE_ID AS IMG_URL /* 이미지URL */ , D2.PD_PRP_VAL19 AS ITEM_KND /* 품목종류 */ , D2.PD_PRP_VAL12 AS BOX_UNIT_QTY /* 박스단위수량 */ , D2.PD_PRP_VAL05 AS MNGT_UNIT_CD /* 관리단위코드 */ , D2.PD_PRP_VAL11 AS DEL_UNT /* 신청단위 */ , NVL(D3.WAREHOUSE_QTY, 0) AS WAREHOUSE_QTY /* 출고창고재고 */ , NVL(D3.CENTER_QTY, 0) AS CENTER_QTY /* 센터A등급재고(조직) */ , NVL(D3.CENTER_B_QTY, 0) AS CENTER_B_QTY /* 센터B등급재고(조직) */ , NVL(D4.INDI_QTY, 0) AS INDI_QTY /* 개인수량 */ , NVL(D5.USE_QTY, 0) AS USE_QTY /* 당월사용수량 */ , NVL(D6.USE_QTY, 0) AS USE_QTY_P /* 전월사용수량 */ , NVL(D7.USE_QTY, 0) AS USE_QTY_Y /* 전년도사용수량 */ , GREATEST(NVL(D5.USE_QTY, 0) - NVL(D3.CENTER_QTY, 0), 0) AS SHORT_SUPPLY /* 신청 예상수량 (전월 - 센터) */ , NVL(D8.TOTAL_QTY, 0) AS TOTAL_QTY /* 총재고 */ FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS D1 /* 상품기본 */ INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL D2 /* 상품각사속성상세 */ ON D2.PD_CD = D1.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ITM_PD_CD , SUM(CASE WHEN #{ostrWareDvCd} = '1' THEN 0 ELSE CASE WHEN WARE_NO = #{ostrWareNo} THEN PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY END END) AS WAREHOUSE_QTY , SUM(CASE WHEN WARE_NO = #{wareNo} THEN PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY END) AS CENTER_QTY , SUM(CASE WHEN WARE_NO = #{wareNo} THEN PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY END) AS CENTER_B_QTY FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_NO IN ( #{wareNo}, #{ostrWareNo} ) GROUP BY ITM_PD_CD ) D3 ON D3.ITM_PD_CD = D1.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT /*+ LEADING(D2 D1) */ D1.ITM_PD_CD , SUM(D1.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY) AS INDI_QTY , SUM(D1.PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY) AS INDI_B_QTY FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ D1 /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ D2 /* 월별창고내역 */ ON D2.WARE_NO = D1.WARE_NO WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND D2.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '21' AND D2.HGR_WARE_NO = #{wareNo} AND D2.WARE_DV_CD = #{wareDvCd} GROUP BY D1.ITM_PD_CD ) D4 ON D4.ITM_PD_CD = D1.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT /*+ LEADING(D2 D1) */ D1.ITM_PD_CD , SUM(D1.USE_QTY) AS USE_QTY FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ D1 /* 서비스작업출고내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ D2 /* 월별창고내역 */ ON D2.WARE_NO = D1.WK_WARE_NO WHERE D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND D1.FNL_VST_FSH_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') || '%' AND D2.HGR_WARE_NO = #{wareNo} AND D2.WARE_DV_CD = #{wareDvCd} GROUP BY D1.ITM_PD_CD ) D5 ON D5.ITM_PD_CD = D1.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT /*+ LEADING(D2 D1) */ D1.ITM_PD_CD , SUM(D1.USE_QTY) AS USE_QTY FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ D1 /* 서비스작업출고내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ D2 /* 월별창고내역 */ ON D2.WARE_NO = D1.WK_WARE_NO WHERE D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND D1.FNL_VST_FSH_DT LIKE TO_CHAR( ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYYMM') || '%' AND D2.HGR_WARE_NO = #{wareNo} AND D2.WARE_DV_CD = #{wareDvCd} GROUP BY D1.ITM_PD_CD ) D6 ON D6.ITM_PD_CD = D1.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT /*+ LEADING(D2 D1) */ D1.ITM_PD_CD , SUM(D1.USE_QTY) AS USE_QTY FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ D1 /* 서비스작업출고내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ D2 /* 월별창고내역 */ ON D2.WARE_NO = D1.WK_WARE_NO WHERE D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND D1.FNL_VST_FSH_DT LIKE TO_CHAR( ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12), 'YYYYMM') || '%' AND D2.HGR_WARE_NO = #{wareNo} AND D2.WARE_DV_CD = #{wareDvCd} GROUP BY D1.ITM_PD_CD ) D7 ON D7.ITM_PD_CD = D1.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT D1.ITM_PD_CD , SUM(D1.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY) AS TOTAL_QTY FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ D1 /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ D2 /* 월별창고내역 */ ON D2.WARE_NO = D1.WARE_NO WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND D2.WARE_DV_CD = #{wareDvCd} AND D2.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = #{wareDtlDvCd} GROUP BY D1.ITM_PD_CD ) D8 ON D8.ITM_PD_CD = D1.PD_CD WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D1.PD_TP_CD = 'M' AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART'
AND D2.PD_PRP_VAL19 = #{itmKndCd}
AND D1.PD_CD LIKE #{itmPdCd}|| '%'
AND D1.PD_NM LIKE '%' || #{itmPdNm} || '%'
ORDER BY D1.PD_CD

SELECT T1.PD_CD AS ITM_PD_CD FROM TB_SVST_ITM_APLC_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T2 ON T2.HGR_WARE_NO = T1.WARE_NO INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T3 ON T3.BASE_YM = T2.APY_YM AND T3.PRTNR_NO = T2.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO AND T3.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T3.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T2.WARE_DTL_DV_CD IN ('21', '31', '32') AND T3.PRTNR_NO = #{session.employeeIDNumber} AND T1.ITM_KND_CD = #{itmKndCd} AND T1.APLC_SN = #{aplcList}
SELECT WARE_DTL_DV_CD , WARE_DV_CD FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND WARE_NO = #{wareNo}
SELECT WARE_DV_CD FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND WARE_NO = #{ostrWareNo}
